content.notice_type: Notice for Engagement on Contract Basis

post_details.name: Accountant (Contractual)
post_details.max_age: Retired persons up to 62 years as on 31-12-2024
post_details.ta_da: As per rules for official tour/visit
post_details.contract_tenure: Initially one year, may be extended up to 3 terms, total max 3 years
post_details.essential_qualification: Bachelor’s degree in Commerce from a recognized University/Institute; proficiency in Excel, Word processing & spreadsheets
post_details.desirable_qualification: English proficiency in speaking & writing; other computer skills
post_details.experience: Accounts-cum-administrative training; analogous posts in Govt./PSU/Autonomous bodies/Central/State Universities for at least 5 years; retired persons preferred

details_required: Date of birth and Age (as on 31-12-2024)
application_procedure.documents_required: Self-attested photocopies of all certificates for proof of education/experience/age, etc.
application_procedure.submission_mode: Single PDF via email to establishment@nita.ac.in

terms_conditions: Appointment purely on contract basis on fixed pay, initially for one year; may be extended up to 3 terms, total max 3 years
Decision of Competent Authority of NIT Agartala final & binding
One month's notice or salary in lieu required to leave during contract period
Engagement may be discontinued at any time if not required
Canvassing or outside influence leads to rejection
Experience defined as relevant post-qualification work in Govt./PSU/Autonomous/Research/Reputed organizations; certificate required
Director's decision final in case of disputes
copy_to: Registrar, Tripura University, Suryamaninagar, Amtali, West Tripura
Registrar, Central Sanskrit University, Lembucherra, Tripura, Agartala
Registrar, MBB University, College Tilla, Agartala
